message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200.  I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $120 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $200 is already a steal for this item.  Could you meet me halfway at $160?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still aiming to keep my expenses low. Would it be possible for us to agree on a price of $140?
